examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
"status": 200,
"msg": "议程详情",
"data": {
"watchIs": false, // 用户是否关注该议程
"id": 2,
"forum": null,
"startDate": "2015-10-01 14:00:00",
"endDate": "2015-10-01 16:00:00",
"location": "深圳",
"title": "Time lapes系统对胚胎选择",
"status": 1, // 状态 0(取消) 1(有效) 2(已结束)
"description": null,
"bgImgUrl": "http://14.17.81.101:8080/files/upload/img/2016/8/893443466420637.png",
"aboutContent": "洞见详情",
"locationImgUrl": "议程地址的地图url",
"hot": 1,
"hotSort": 3,
"lectors": [
  {
     "id": 66,
     "name": "333333333333333333",
     "password": "1231",
     "description": null,
     "ename": "1111",
     "nationality": "1111",
     "sex": "男",
     "tel": "6",
     "hospital": "111",
     "post": "111",
     "titles": "111",
     "department": "111",
     "imgUrl": null,
     "email": "1234422@qq.com",
     "remark": "111",
     "type": 1,
     "createDate": "2016-08-26 13:12:48"
  }
] // 议程讲师信息
}
}

title: 4.议程综合查询接口
name: agenda_query

Parameter.description: 议程分类ID(反思创新... 等的id)
用户id(要和watch一起传入才能获取用户关注议程)

description: 议程综合查询接口(议程日历接口)

examples.title: Success-Response:
Success-Response:

Success 200.description: 返回app 的版本信息和下载路径
这是一个html 页面直接通过webview 访问
这是一个html 页面直接通过webview 访问

title: 2.会议详情
name: forum_detail
description: 获取会议详情 id = 0 默认返回最新的会议

Success 200.description: 会议状态 0未开始 1进行中 2已结束

Parameter.description: 议程id(暂时不传) 用来三级权限
